backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a change ensuring only Rose Day includes a specific apology note.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component gating access by anniversary date and rendering the Valentine's Week UI.
Form component requiring the correct anniversary date before granting access to the app.
frontend/src/components/ValentineDayCard: Card component displaying each day's locked or unlocked greeting and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, identity storage, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines OKLCH-based theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utility classes for romantic-themed styling.
frontend/src/lib/anniversaryGate.ts: Provides normalization and validation utilities for checking a user‑entered anniversary date against the expected value.
frontend/src/lib/dateLocking.ts: Exports helpers to determine if content is unlocked based on a date and to generate human‑readable unlock labels.
frontend/src/lib/valentinesSchedule.ts: Defines the ValentineDay interface and a schedule array listing each Valentine’s Week day with its unlock date, message, and icon index.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and architecture notes for building a date‑locked Valentine’s Week greeting site with an anniversary gate.
